# The tokenizer extension

This extension provides an interface to the PHP tokenizer embedded in the Zend
Engine.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_TOKENIZER

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_TOKENIZER_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
